TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XsltArgumentList extends System.Object

summary.span: Contains a variable number of arguments which are either XSLT parameters or extension objects.

span.span: Contains a variable number of arguments which are either XSLT parameters or extension objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类方法。This class is used by the method. 它允许参数和扩展对象，若要从样式表中调用。It allows parameters and extension objects to be invoked from within the style sheet. 当参数和对象添加到，它们分别与命名空间限定的名称和命名空间 URI 相关联。When the parameters and objects are added to the , they are associated with a namespace qualified name and a namespace URI, respectively. 以下是传递一个对象，而不是使用嵌入的脚本如优点``:The following are advantages to passing an object rather than using an embedded script such as ``: - 改善了类的包装和重用。Provides better encapsulation and reuse of classes. - 使样式表较小且更易于维护。Allows style sheets to be smaller and more easily maintained. - 支持传递节点片段 (通过) 样式表。Supports passing node fragments (through the ) to the style sheet. 有关使用详细信息，请参阅[XSLT 扩展对象](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-extension-objects.md)并[XSLT 参数](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-parameters.md)。For more information about using the , see [XSLT Extension Objects](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-extension-objects.md) and [XSLT Parameters](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-parameters.md).

summary.span: Adds a new object to the and associates it with the namespace URI.

span.span: Adds a new object to the and associates it with the namespace URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `params`关键字，它允许的未指定要传递的参数数目，目前不支持。The `params` keyword, which allows an unspecified number of parameters to be passed, is currently not supported. 利用使用定义的方法的 XSLT 样式表`params`关键字无法正常工作。XSLT style sheets that utilize methods defined with the `params` keyword does not work correctly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[params](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/params.md)。For more information, see [params](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/params.md). ## Examples 在以下示例中，样式表使用 XSLT 扩展对象要转换的书籍价格。In the following example, the style sheet uses an XSLT extension object to convert the book price. [!code-csharp[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/CS/addextobj.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/VB/addextobj.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下数据文件作为输入。The example uses the following data files as input. `books.xml` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/XML/books.xml#2)] `prices.xsl` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/XML/prices.xsl#3)]

exception.span: The is either or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform The already has an extension object associated with it.

span.span: The is either or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform The already has an extension object associated with it.

exception.span: The caller does not have sufficient permissions to call this method.

span.span: The caller does not have sufficient permissions to call this method.

summary.span: Adds a parameter to the and associates it with the namespace qualified name.

span.span: Adds a parameter to the and associates it with the namespace qualified name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `parameter`应该对应于某种 W3C 类型。The `parameter` should correspond to a W3C type. 下表显示了 W3C 类型、 XPath 或 XSLT，和 corresponding.NET 类。The following table shows the W3C types, either XPath or XSLT, and the corresponding.NET class. |W3C 类型W3C Type|Equivalent.NET 类 （类型）Equivalent.NET Class (Type)| |--------------|-----------------------------------| |`String` (XPath)`String` (XPath)|| |`Boolean` (XPath)`Boolean` (XPath)|| |`Number` (XPath)`Number` (XPath)|| |`Result Tree Fragment` (XSLT)`Result Tree Fragment` (XSLT)|| |`Node Set` (XPath)`Node Set` (XPath)|

`XPathNavigator[]`| |`Node`\* (XPath)`Node`\* (XPath)|| \*等效于包含单个节点的节点集。\*This is equivalent to a node set that contains a single node. 如果正在从样式表内调用的参数对象不是上述值之一，它将转换根据以下规则：If the parameter object being invoked from within the style sheet is not one of the above, it is converted according to the following rules: - CLR 数字类型转换为 。CLR numeric types are converted to . - 类型转换为 。The type is converted to . - 类型转换为 。 types are converted to . `XPathNavigator[]` 转换为。`XPathNavigator[]` is converted to . 所有其他类型均将引发错误。All other types throw an error. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来创建表示当前日期和时间的参数。The following example uses the method to create a parameter representing the current date and time. [!code-csharp[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/CS/addparam.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/VB/addparam.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下两个数据文件作为输入。The example uses the following two data files as input. `order.xml` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/XML/order.xml#2)] `order.xsl` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/XML/order.xsl#3)]

span.span: The is either or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform.

exception.span: The is not a valid name according to the W3C XML specification.

span.span: The is not a valid name according to the W3C XML specification.

exception.span: The already has a parameter associated with it.

span.span: The already has a parameter associated with it.

summary.span: Occurs when a message is specified in the style sheet by the xsl:message element.

span.span: Occurs when a message is specified in the style sheet by the xsl:message element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未注册事件，所有消息通过管道都传递到标准输出。If the event is not registered, all messages are piped to standard out.
